Html:
1. When you hover the mouse over any of the rollover buttons/links on a page they all show the same tooltip and status bar message. Why is this?
2. The Cancel button on the edit event page does nothing (the code looks identical to the edit news cancel button).

PS When is the next R3 beta coming out

1) IDK. It's probably some view state thing. That's easily changed in the code.
2) OK... I'll check that. Can you put that in an issue?

Whenever we get to it and there are some changes.
